item.title: Ridiculous amount of leaves piled up un the payment, 19th November
item.description:
Leaves have only been cleared by the residents. Need the council to come either their machine to clear thoroughly. It is now becoming a danger hazard with people slipping on them.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 207, Elmers End Road, Elmers End, London Borough of Bromley

item.title: Dumped bedframe and discarded bin, 19th November
item.description:
Bedframe, was on 87s front garden for a couple of weeks, and now they've dumped it on the pavement. This is not the first time. They've also left a bin down for weeks- full of the wrong waste so bin men aren't taking it.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kingsground, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: This vehicle has been abandoned in my car parking space that belongs to my Flat 12 Centurion Court, Woolwich SE18 5DP, 19th November
item.description:
This vehicle has been abandoned in my car parking space that belongs to my Flat 12 Centurion Court, Woolwich SE18 5DP The car is untaxed and has no MOT and has been abandoned here for more than a year. It is a huge nuisance because my tenants can't park their car in their allocated car parking space.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Rush Grove Street, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More Flytipping, 19th November
item.description:

item.title: This matter has not been addressed yet because it was not previously flagged as a priority, and no formal report had been submitted until now. Additionally, routine inspections in that area have not highlighted this issue, which may have contributed to the lack of earlier action., 19th November
item.description:
I’m writing to raise a concern about the Sainsbury’s Express shop located on Beckenham Road. The area outside the store consistently appears untidy, with litter scattered around on a regular basis. Given that this is a food retail outlet, the lack of cleanliness raises potential health and hygiene issues that I believe warrant urgent attention. I kindly ask if you could speak with the store management or take appropriate action to ensure the area is maintained to a suitable standard. A cleaner and more presentable environment would benefit both the community and the store’s reputation.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Parish Lane, Penge, London Borough of Bromley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cracked and uneven pavement slabs, 19th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Overbury Avenue, Shortlands, Bromley, London Borough of Bromley

item.title: Bed base still there. Has not been ‘fixed’., 19th November
item.description:
